summary: A cop from the moon is sent to the Earth, now possessed by motorcycle-riding "Mad Max"-like inhabitants, to stop a serum from being released that he believes is going to destroy the Earth...
cast: Michael Par√©|Billy Drago|Walker Brandt|Robin Smith|Gavin van den Berg|Wilson Dunster|Greg Latter|Molemo Maarohanye|Ron Smerczak|David Sherwood|David Clatworthy|Ian Yule|Susan Allison|Annabel Linder|Kim Windo|Darryl Werner|Marelize Pretorius|Peter Tim|Lucas Pantos|Brian Cook|Paul Kruger|Fay Faulkenbridge
title: Lunarcop
